title: blocking Google Analytics?
content:
Does anyone know any way for macs? I tried google, and they only give PC solutions.

I installed CustomizeGoogle, but that doesnâ€™t fully work.

thanks.
author: evilfansanfran

comments.content: Just set their servers to resolve to 127.0.0.1 in /etc/hosts. You could probably also use Firefox and put all those servers in the block list for Adblock.
